Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class PaymentDAO

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.PaymentDAO
public class PaymentDAO extends Object
The class PaymentDAO defines a model for the management of the query of the entity Payments of the database.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

    • getPaymentServiceByDescription

      public PaymentService getPaymentServiceByDescription(String description)
      Gets the payment service given the description.
      Parameters:
      description - the description.
      Returns:
      the reference of the payment service or null.

    • getLastPaymentFee

      public Date getLastPaymentFee(User member, Boat boat, FeeType feeType)
      Gets the last payment made given the type of the fee and other parameters.
      Parameters:
      member - the member for which the last membership fee has been paid
      boat - the boat for which the last storage fee has been paid
      feeType - the type of fee for which the last payment is due.
      Returns:
      the date of the last payment or null.

    • checkPaymentStorageFee

      public boolean checkPaymentStorageFee(Boat boat)
      Check if the payment of the storage fee of a boat is still valid.
      Parameters:
      boat - the boat.
      Returns:
      true if the last payment is valid.

    • checkPaymentMembershipFee

      public boolean checkPaymentMembershipFee(User member)
      Checks whether the payment of the fee of the club member is still valid.
      Parameters:
      member - the club member.
      Returns:
      true if the last payment is valid.

    • getAllPayments

      public ArrayList<Payment> getAllPayments(User user, FeeType feeType)
      Gets the list of all the payments.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who has paid.
      feeType - the type of fee paid.
      Returns:
      the list.

    • payFee

      public void payFee(User member, Boat boat, RaceRegistration raceRegistration, Fee fee, PaymentService paymentService, Boolean atLeastOneBoat, Boolean refund)
      Pays a fee, that is, inserts a payment in the database.
      Parameters:
      member - the club member who pays the fee.
      boat - the boat of which it is necessary to pay the storage fee or null if the type of fee to be paid is different.
      raceRegistration - the race registration of which it is necessary to pay the race registration fee or null if the type of fee to be paid is different.
      fee - the fee to be paid.
      paymentService - the type of service used to pay.
      atLeastOneBoat - true if the member owns at least one boat.
      refund - true if the payment is a refund.

    • getPaymentByRaceRegistration

      public Payment getPaymentByRaceRegistration(int id)
      Gets the payment given a registration to a race.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the registration for the race.
      Returns:
      the reference of the payment or null.

    • refundRegistrationFee

      public void refundRegistrationFee(int id)
      Refunds the payment of the registration for a race.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the registration for the race.
